title: Voting Apps
subtitle: Your page visitors want their voices to be heard, so activate a fun voting competion and let them choose what person, place, product, or cause deserves to be recognized.
intro_title: Make Every Vote (And Brand Impression) Count
intro_description: North Social can help you craft a viral voting competition that gives your fans a voice in the outcome, and rewards them for getting out the vote to their network.

features.title: Bracket Style Tournaments
features.description: Whether you're holding a beauty contest or trying to find the "it" girl for your next magazine cover or photo shoot, we can build you a custom app that puts your brand and Facebook page at the center of attention.

features.title: Consumer Research
features.description: Brands seeking a low-cost, high-impact way to mine quick consumer insights should look to activate a fun and engaging voting competition on their Facebook page. Excellent for getting a temperature check on new ideas or brand concepts.

features.title: Smells Like School Spirit
features.description: Quit crossing your fingers in hopes of getting an NCAA Tournament birth. Let our team help you launch a bracket voting competition to send your brand or school spirit viral.

features.title: Local Showdown
features.description: Every town has a few can't miss places the locals all love. So create a viral voting competition to see which bartender, waiter, or barista wears the social crown in your community.
